deal_name: Nordbyte Logistics — AI SDR Risk Pilot

emails.subject: Quick intro — reducing lead drop-offs at Nordbyte
emails.body:
Hi Alex,

Came across Nordbyte while looking at logistics teams scaling inbound sales.

We’re working with RevOps teams to identify where leads stall or silently drop out of the funnel — especially between first contact and qualification.

Worth a short intro call to see if this is relevant for you?

Best,
Maya

emails.subject: Re: Quick intro — reducing lead drop-offs at Nordbyte
emails.body:
Hi Maya,

Sounds potentially interesting. Can you share a bit more on how you approach this?

Alex

emails.subject: Re: Quick intro — reducing lead drop-offs at Nordbyte
emails.body:
Sure.

In short: we analyze real SDR communication (emails + meetings) and surface risk patterns — slow response times, unclear next steps, soft objections, internal blockers.

Teams use this to catch deals that *look alive* in CRM but are actually cooling off.

If helpful, happy to walk through a concrete example in 20 min.

Maya

emails.subject: Following up
emails.body:
Hi Alex,

Just checking if a short intro makes sense on your side.

Maya

emails.subject: Re: Following up
emails.body:
Hey Maya,

Yeah, let's do a quick call. Early next week should work.

Alex

emails.subject: Re: Following up
emails.body:
Great. How does Tuesday or Wednesday look?

Maya

emails.subject: Scheduling
emails.body:
Hi Alex,

Just looping back on timing for our call.

Maya

emails.subject: Re: Scheduling
emails.body:
Sorry for the delay. Wednesday 15:00 UTC works.

Alex

emails.subject: Invite — Intro call
emails.body:
Perfect. Sending a calendar invite now.

Looping in Sam from our side as well.

Maya

emails.subject: Next steps
emails.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks again for the conversation earlier.

Happy to share a short summary + example dashboard we discussed. Let me know if that helps move this forward.

Maya

emails.subject: Following up on next steps
emails.body:
Hi Alex,

Wanted to check if you had a chance to review the summary.

Maya

emails.subject: Re: Following up on next steps
emails.body:
Hey Maya,

Still discussing this internally. Will get back to you once we align on priorities.

Alex
